name: Chocolate Chip Cookies. Whole grain, low-fat Vegan
description: These are not the classic chewy chocolate chip cookies. These are crumbly, delicious, quick, super addictive, and how I like mine. The crumblier and fatter, the better!
recipeIngredient: 2.5 Tablespoons ground raw sugar (3 Tbsp for sweeter)
3/4 cup whole wheat flour (or 1/2 cup ww and 1/4 cup almond flour)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add hot water, almond milk, vanilla, flaxmeal and agave.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add hot water, almond milk, vanilla, flaxmeal and agave.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oils and raw sugar, salt, whisk for a minute until well combined. Let sit for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oils and raw sugar, salt, whisk for a minute until well combined. Let sit for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk again for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk again for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the baking powder in the wheat flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the baking powder in the wheat flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flour and mix with a spoon or hand. you might have to knead it a bit for the oils to combine well with the flour. If the dough is wet, add a few teaspoons more flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flour and mix with a spoon or hand. you might have to knead it a bit for the oils to combine well with the flour. If the dough is wet, add a few teaspoons more flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chocolate chips, knead to distribute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chocolate chips, knead to distribute.

recipeInstructions.text: The dough will feel crumbly, but will come together when pressed and will smooth out a bit with the warmth of the hands. Some cracks are fine.
recipeInstructions.name: The dough will feel crumbly, but will come together when pressed and will smooth out a bit with the warmth of the hands. Some cracks are fine.

recipeInstructions.text: Make flat balls. Place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Make flat balls. Place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 13-14 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F for 13-14 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool, consume and if possible, leave some for hubbs!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool, consume and if possible, leave some for hubbs!

keywords: crumbly cookies, low fat, vegan cookies
